title: Incident management
description: A loss of confidentiality, integrity, or availability occurs due to inadequate incident management and the failure of controls related to incident response, learning from incidents, evidence collection, logging, monitoring activities, and incident management responsibilities and preparation.

title: Supplier management
description: A loss of confidentiality, integrity, or availability occurs due to inadequate supplier management and the failure of controls related to information security in supplier relationships, supplier agreements, ICT supply chain management, supplier service monitoring and review, cloud service security, and confidentiality agreements.

title: Policy management
description: A loss of confidentiality, integrity, or availability occurs due to inadequate policy management and the failure of controls related to information security policies, acceptable use of information, and compliance with information security policies and standards.

title: Information security management including project and change
description: A loss of confidentiality, integrity, or availability occurs due to inadequate ISMS management, including project and change management, and the failure of controls related to information security roles and responsibilities, segregation of duties, management responsibilities, contact with authorities and special interest groups, information security in project management, change management, and protection of information systems during audit and testing.

title: Threat and vulnerability management
description: A loss of confidentiality, integrity, or availability occurs due to inadequate threat and vulnerability management and the failure of controls related to threat intelligence, malware protection, and technical vulnerability management.

title: Information management
description: A loss of confidentiality, integrity, or availability occurs due to inadequate information management and the failure of controls related to information classification, labeling, transfer, and inventory management of information and associated assets.

title: Human resource security
description: A loss of confidentiality, integrity, or availability occurs due to inadequate human resource security and the failure of controls related to the return of assets, documented operating procedures, screening, terms and conditions of employment, information security awareness, education and training, disciplinary processes, responsibilities after termination or change of employment, and information security event reporting.

title: Access management includes cryptography
description: A loss of confidentiality, integrity, or availability occurs due to inadequate access management, including cryptography, and the failure of controls related to access control, identity management, authentication information, access rights, privileged access rights, use of cryptography, information access restriction, and secure authentication.

title: Business continuity management including backup and redundancy
description: A loss of confidentiality, integrity, or availability occurs due to inadequate business continuity management, including backup and redundancy, and the failure of controls related to information security during disruption, ICT readiness for business continuity, information backup, and redundancy of information processing facilities.
checkProcess: Business Continuity Exercise, DR Testing and Backup Review

title: Management of legislation
description: A loss of confidentiality, integrity, or availability occurs due to inadequate management of legislation and the failure of controls related to the identification of legal, statutory, regulatory, and contractual requirements, intellectual property rights, protection of records, privacy and protection of PII, and independent review of information security.

title: Remote working security
description: A loss of confidentiality, integrity, or availability occurs due to inadequate remote working security and the failure of controls related to remote working, security of assets off-premises, and user endpoint devices.

title: Physical security
description: A loss of confidentiality, integrity, or availability occurs due to inadequate physical security and the failure of controls related to physical security perimeters, entry controls, securing offices, rooms and facilities, physical security monitoring, protection against physical and environmental threats, working in secure areas, and clear desk and clear screen policies.
notes: We use Endpoint Security, Remote working policies, Awareness as primnary contyrols to treat this risk. Clear Deskj ins impoortant all other controls can be excluded. Business Conmtinuyity and backups.

title: Management of equipment
description: A loss of confidentiality, integrity, or availability occurs due to inadequate management of equipment and the failure of controls related to storage media, supporting utilities, cabling security, equipment maintenance, secure disposal or re-use of equipment, and equipment siting and protection.

title: Development practices
description: A loss of confidentiality, integrity, or availability occurs due to inadequate development practices and the failure of controls related to the use of privileged utility programs, secure development lifecycle, application security requirements, secure system architecture and engineering principles, secure coding, security testing in development and acceptance, outsourced development, separation of development, test and production environments, test information, and access to source code.

title: Configuration management
description: A loss of confidentiality, integrity, or availability occurs due to inadequate configuration management and the failure of controls related to clock synchronization, software installation on operational systems, capacity management, and configuration management.

title: Data management
description: A loss of confidentiality, integrity, or availability occurs due to inadequate data management and the failure of controls related to information deletion, data masking, and data leakage prevention.
